dialogs.responseText: The map displays various animals that one can find in Quepland, as well as their habitats. You can look more closely for details.
The map shows rabbits, pigeons, and wild boars in Cochee Clearing, with deer, turkey, and pheasants roaming the rest of the forest.
The map shows deer, moose, and various bears all over the islands.
The map shows rabbits, wild boar, and bison in Tsu Valley.
